sentences.en: He blab bed my confidences to every one.
sentences.cn: 他把我告诉他的知心话告诉了每个人.

sentences.en: He that is a blab is a scab.
Her mistake was to blab about their affair.
sentences.cn: 她错在说出了他们的婚外情。

sentences.en: I never pay any attention to blab like that.
sentences.cn: 我从不在意那种无稽之谈.

sentences.en: I'll be coming . " To hell with it! The rudeness of that big blab - mouth!
sentences.cn: 该死的话, 是那么不 客气 的从那吃 红薯 的大口里说出!

sentences.en: She will be sure to blab and it will be all over the town in no time.
sentences.cn: 她肯定会乱说,而全城的人立刻就会知道这件事情.

sentences.en: She'll blab it all over the school.
These stories are false, just so much blab.
sentences.cn: 那些故事都是假的, 全是一派胡言.

sentences.en: Those stories are false, just so much blab.
sentences.cn: 那些故事是假的, 全是胡扯.

sentences.en: Will you promise not to blab to Mom and Dad?
sentences.cn: 你能保证不会向爸妈泄密吗？

words.tran_cn: 多嘴的人；泄密者；胡言乱语

trans.tran_en: If someone blabs about something secret, they tell people about it
